html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-02542023-03-22NRCAN
ActCanadian Energy Regulator Act
PrecisAppointment of GEORGE VEGH of Toronto, Ontario, to be Chairperson of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Energy Regulator, to hold office during pleasure for a term of five years, on a part-time basis, effective August 22, 2023.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Appointment of GEORGE VEGH of Toronto, Ontario, to be Chairperson of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Energy Regulator, to hold office during pleasure for a term of five years, on a part-time basis, effective August 22, 2023.
